targets.query: SELECT "cpu_time", "duration", "logical_reads"*8, "physical_reads"*8, row_count, "writes", "session_id", "AxSession", "AxUser", "SqlEventName", "SqlHostName", "SqlUser", "SqlQueryHash","hex_query_hash", "queryplan_hash","hex_queryplan_hash", "DatabaseName", "result","isFetch" FROM "queryhashcodemetrics"."sqlXeEvents" WHERE "SqlQueryHash" =~ /^$QueryHash$/ AND "AxUser" =~ /^$USER$/ AND "SqlUser" =~ /^$SQLUSER$/ AND "SqlEventName" =~ /^$sqleventname$/ AND "SqlHostName" =~ /^$CLIENTHOST$/ AND "AxSession" =~ /^$SESSION$/ AND  "SqlInstance" =~ /^$SQLHOSTNODE$/ AND $timeFilter

list.name: USER
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "AxUser"

list.name: SQLUSER
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "SqlUser"

list.name: SESSION
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "AxSession"

list.name: CLIENTHOST
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "SqlHostName"

list.name: DBNAME
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "DatabaseName"

list.name: SQLHOSTNODE
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "SqlInstance"

list.name: QueryHash
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeEvents" WITH KEY = "SqlQueryHash"

list.name: FetchesQueryHash
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlXeFetches" WITH KEY = "query_hash"
